sources.title: The Super Salesman (1947)
sources.description: Heckel and Jeckle. the two talking-magpies are selling hair-tonic in a public park without a license... Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-super-salesman-1947/

metadata.Plot: Heckel and Jeckle. the two talking-magpies are selling hair-tonic in a public park without a license. They are chased by the park caretaker whom they trick again and again. Then a stern police dog get involved and their feathers start to fly. They find a good use for the hair-tonic but it backfires on them.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
